extension.description:
K2 AJAX Search

The Joomla extension K2 AJAX Search allows you to search contents of the K2 component and makes it possible to filter by multiple categories, by multi-select list extra fields and by creation date. The extension has a beautiful appearance, shows a list of previous results by using AJAX and is highly customizable. Besides, it is compatible with Joomla 1.7, 2.5, 3.0 and all current browsers.

You can find the K2 AJAX Search settings at the module manager. Remember to enable the K2 AJAX Search plugin.
